I've been reading this mailing list for a long time on various e-
mails, even if I've never posted, and would like to note that 
Archers are one of the strongest classes in the game, with 4 unique 
attacks, only one (their first attack) of which is more or less 
useless.

A barrage of exploding arrows would be utterly insane - I already 
have enough trouble dueling my friend when he's an archer due to the 
fact he can hit half of the map with Exploding Arrows as it is.

The superpowerful single arrow would be useful for normal gameplay, 
as you're usually able to hit enemies with most attacks. And 
resistance to exploding arrows' fear effects would help a lot, too.

As far as homing arrows, I must say that I disagree - Archers, with 
MORE than enough ways to deal utter death and destruction if they 
find you, don't need a way to do it automatically.
